channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Identity Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Microsoft Identity Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-0908|2024-09-16T22:40:36.118Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- microsoft%20identity%20manager
item.description: Microsoft Identity Manager 2016 SP1 allows an attacker to gain elevated privileges when it does not properly sanitize a specially crafted attribute value being displayed to a user on an affected MIM 2016 server, aka "Microsoft Identity Manager XSS Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability."
